text:
I was fortunate to have a long conversation tonight on @CNN with @andersoncooper talking about #COVID19 and why my most optimistic scenario has it endangering us for another 36 months.
https://t.co/NUMOJ0lx5a

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Anderson Cooper 360
entity.description: Anderson Cooper goes beyond the headlines with in-depth reporting and investigations. Through nightly "Keeping Them Honest" reports, Anderson keeps his commitment to holding those in power accountable. And, of course, there's the RidicuList, a tongue-in-cheek commentary on the day's news that may leave viewers (and Anderson) laughing. Joining him are guests that frequently include political and legal analysts.

entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.

🌍Updates: 15 NY children diagnosed with syndrome possibly tied to COVID-19
